description: This file defines a utility object 'StringUtils' with methods to join and split strings using linked list data structures.

classes.name: StringUtils
classes.description: A Kotlin singleton object providing string manipulation utilities using linked lists.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Converts a LinkedList into a String using JoinUtils.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a String into a LinkedList using SplitUtils.
